name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-warehouse-template
title: Warehouse Template - PowerApps Canvas App Template
shortDescription: The Warehouse Template is a free Power Apps Canvas App built to help power users jumpstart the creation of their own warehouse or inventory management solution.
longDescription: The Warehouse Template is a free Power Apps Canvas App built to help power users jumpstart the creation of their own warehouse or inventory management solution.

references.name: Microsoft Power Platform documentation
references.description: Discover how to make the most of Microsoft Power Platform products with online training courses, docs, and videos covering product capabilities and how-to guides.
